title: Lemon Herb Grilled Chicken
steps: Whisk lemon juice, zest, garlic, olive oil, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Grill chicken 6-7 minutes per side until cooked through.
Rest 5 minutes before slicing. Serve warm.
description: Bright, zesty grilled chicken with aromatics and herbs.

title: Creamy Mushroom Pasta
steps: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Saut√© mushrooms in butter until golden.
Pour in cream; simmer until slightly thickened.

title: Tropical Fruit Salad
steps: Combine all fruit in a bowl.
Toss gently, garnish with mint, and serve chilled.
description: Refreshing and naturally sweet fruit medley.
